bibl.title: Coptic Ostraka from Qasr al-Dakhleh.
bibl.note: Presents the Coptic ostraka found in Qasr al-Dakhleh (Dakhila) during the years 2007-2009 and provides the text of a complete letter from a foreman to the headmen of the imperial fort.

bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: Iain Gardner, Coptic Ostraka from Qasr al-Dakhleh.

Roger S. Bagnall, Paola Davoli & Colin A. Hope (edd.), assisted by Bruce E. Parr (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 15 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 471-474, 1 fig.
Presents the Coptic ostraka found in Qasr al-Dakhleh (Dakhila) during the years 2007-2009 and provides the text of a complete letter from a foreman to the headmen of the imperial fort.
